rpg.item

Interface Item

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Armor, BackPack, Container, Dukat, ItemImplementation, Purse, Weapon

    public interface Item
    An interface of items involving a weight, a value and an identification
    Author:
    Mathias

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canHaveAsId(long id)
      Checks whether or not this item can have the given id as its id.
      boolean canHaveAsValue(int value)
      Checks whether the given value is a valid value for this weapon.
      long getId()
      Return the identification of this item
      int getValue()
      Return the value of this item
      Weight getWeight()
      Return the weight of this item
      boolean hasValidId()
      Checks whether or not this item has a valid id.
      boolean hasValidValue()
      Checks whether this item has a valid value.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        @Basic
@Raw
long getId()
        Return the identification of this item

      • canHaveAsId

        @Raw
boolean canHaveAsId(long id)
        Checks whether or not this item can have the given id as its id.
        Returns:
        False if the given id is negative. | if( id < 0 ) then | result == false

      • hasValidId

        @Raw
boolean hasValidId()
        Checks whether or not this item has a valid id.
        Returns:
        True if and only if this item has a valid id. | result == canHaveAsId( getId() )

      • getValue

        @Basic
int getValue()
        Return the value of this item

      • canHaveAsValue

        @Raw
boolean canHaveAsValue(int value)
        Checks whether the given value is a valid value for this weapon.
        Returns:
        False if the given value is negative | if(value < 0) then | result == false

      • hasValidValue

        @Raw
boolean hasValidValue()
        Checks whether this item has a valid value.
        Returns:
        True if and only if this item can have its value as its value. | result == canHaveAsValue( getValue() )

      • getWeight

        @Basic
@Immutable
Weight getWeight()
        Return the weight of this item
